3. Using lancing device at fingertip sampling site 
 ∙ Place the cocked lancing device against the pad of the finger. The best puncture sites are on 
the middle or ring fingers. Choose a different site each time you test. Repeated puncturing at 
the same sample site may cause pain or skin calluses.
